project_context_llm: A Python script for testing the connection to a LiteLLM (OpenAI-compatible) API endpoint, printing out detailed model information, performance metrics, and configuration details.
overall_objective_llm: To create, refine, and verify a robust Python test script that connects to an LLM API, confirms connectivity, retrieves and displays key model/version information, and summarizes model capabilities and usage statistics for diagnostic and documentation purposes.
conversation_title: Test connection and print model information
